message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our product to you. It is an exceptional opportunity that we believe could significantly enhance your business operations. We understand its value to you is estimated at $800,000. Our initial offer for this product is $950,000. We are confident this price reflects the quality and potential benefits it offers to you. We look forward to discussing this further with you.

Alice, thank you for your offer. While I appreciate your enthusiasm for this product, $950,000 is unfortunately above my budget. I'm willing to pay $800,000, which is the maximum I can afford at this time. I believe this is a fair price considering the value we both recognize in this product. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.

Thank you for your prompt response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to meet us halfway. In light of this, we would like to offer you the product at a price of $850,000. This proposal aims to find a mutually beneficial solution while respecting the value you place on the product. We hope this revised offer aligns more closely with your budget and looks forward to your consideration.
